title: Chizkuni on Genesis
text: "and the tree of knowledge of good and bad:" as its (Onkelos) translation (explains) - the tree which the one who eats it(s fruit) knows good and bad.

I have given it all to you: Since [the animals] were rescued by the ark which you built, and it is because of you that they were saved, behold, they are in your hands, and you can do with them whatever you see fit.
